description: Or-argent.fr offers an optimal solution to protect your assets through the purchase and storage of precious metals.
buy-bullion: LBMA certified bullion bars and coins
direct-ownership: Direct ownership, with personal access to the vaults

create-an-account.content: Fill in the signup form, then provide the required documents to verify your account.

order.content: Select your wished products, then confirm your order by proceeding to the payment.

proceed-to-payment.content: Transfer the funds to finalize your order.

live-price.content1: 24hrs a day, 5 days a week, in more than 110 currencies.
live-price.content2: Historical charts to visualize long-term trends, as well as tools to monitor your investments and the precious metals performance on a daily basis.
live-price.content4: For any other gold or silver investment, our client support is available by email or phone, Monday to Friday from 9 am to 6.30 pm.

sell-bullion: Buy-back of your metals, guaranteed investment liquidity
store: Secure storage outside the banking system
title: Invest in physical gold and silver bullions
